1621522848_1PSeiYvqdseW3aoqEV5gddDRr7gCH.body: What 'fork' are you talking about? Fork of all ZeroNet software or ZeroTalk++?

> [zeroseed6](#comment_2_1PSeiYvqdseW3aoqEV5gddDRr7gCHSJPHB): zeronet software

If you're under linux, I think you can already run this one: https://github.com/zeronet-enhanced/ZeroNet
Just press "Code" button and download as zip. This will be the `core` dir files.

Duplicate your old zeronet folder, and then replace everything in your `core` dir with zip contents.
